headline: NXP Semiconductors Falls 7% in 3 Months: How to Play the Stock?
summary: Broad-based inventory corrections, macroeconomic issues, fierce competition and stretched valuations are making NXPI stock risky for investors.

headline: Dutch chipmaker NXP and South Korea's bitsensing in radar deal
summary: South Korean startup bitsensing has entered a partnership with Dutch computer chip manufacturer NXP to sell radar systems used in cars, the Asian company's CEO told Reuters on Monday. ...
